title: Community Empowerment Fund 2025
description: Funding for grassroots NGOs focused on local community development and sustainability.

title: Women in Tech Innovation Grant
description: Supports women-led startups developing innovative technology solutions.
eligibility: Women-led startup, less than 3 years old

title: Rural Development Initiative
description: Grants for projects improving infrastructure and livelihoods in rural areas.

title: Climate Action Seed Fund
description: Seed funding for early-stage startups tackling climate change solutions.

title: Arts & Culture Revitalization Grant
description: Support for initiatives promoting local arts and cultural heritage.
